column1: #text=Today is the day of the week I usually go grocery shopping .
#text=This morning I checked in the refrigerator and threw out any spoiled food and looked to see what I would need more of this week .
#text=I thought about what dinners I would have , and how many packed lunches I would need this week .
#text=I started a list of things to buy after planning my meals .
#text=The grocery store is nearby so I took my reusable bags and my list and walked to the store .
#text=I got a shopping cart on my way in .
#text=I selected the nonperishables first , then went to the produce section , then the refrigerated , and finally the frozen department .
#text=I went through the self checkout line as it seemed a shorter wait .
#text=After scanning and placing my items in my reusable bags I paid by sliding my credit card , and then took the printed receipt .
